code: import axios from"axios";var TOKEN_KEY="token";var authAxios=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH_API_BASE_URL});function login(email,password){var data={email:email,password:password};return authAxios.post("/login",data);}function validateToken(token){return authAxios.post("/validatetoken",{token:token});}function askResetPassword(email){return authAxios.post("/askresetpassword",{email:email});}function newPassword(token,password){var data={token:token,password:password};return authAxios.patch("/newpassword",data);}function getBearerToken(){var token=localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);if(!token)return null;return"bearer ".concat(token);}export{login,validateToken,askResetPassword,TOKEN_KEY,getBearerToken,newPassword};
